name: Accessibility - Page has proper language attribute
message: The HTML tag should have a lang attribute set to 'en' for proper accessibility

name: Accessibility - Images have alt text
message: All images should have alt attributes for screen readers

name: Structure - Page has header section
message: Your page should include a <header> element

name: Structure - Page has main content area
message: Your page should include a <main> element for the primary content

name: Structure - Page has footer section
message: Your page should include a <footer> element

name: Navigation - Main menu has proper ARIA role
message: The navigation menu should have role='navigation' for better accessibility

name: Content - Page has main heading
message: Include an h1 heading as the main title of your page

name: Content - Page has multiple sections
message: The page should have exactly 3 section elements

name: Form - Contact form exists
message: Include a form element for the contact form

name: Form - Has required name field
message: The form should include a required name field

name: Form - Has email field with validation
message: The form should include an email field with proper input type

name: Form - Has submit button
message: The form should include a submit button
